Reviews.Title: Best toy I have purchased in years!
Reviews.Author: Les J.
Reviews.Content: It's BIG!The picture quality is superb.Controls and set up is simple.3D Movies are incredible and games bring you right into the scene.Beach Camera delivered on, in perfect condition.

ProductInfo.Features:
KDL-70R550A 70-Inch 120Hz 3D Wifi 1080p LED HDTV
BDP-S3100 Blu-ray Disc player with super Wi-Fi
6 ft High Speed 3D Ready 120hz Ready 1080p HDMI Cable (Bulk Packaged)
Home/Office Surge Protector Power Kit (270 joules protection)
Performance TV/LCD Screen Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: KDL-70R550A 70" 120Hz 3D Wifi 1080p LED Blu-ray Streaming WiFi Bundle. Bundle Includes Blu-ray Disc player with super Wi-Fi, 6 ft High Speed 3D Ready 120hz Ready 1080p HDMI Cable, Surge Protector Power Kit, and Performance TV/LCD Screen Cleaning Kit.
